column1: #text=I went to the library in town the other day because I really want to read this book that my friend told me about .
#text=After driving to the library , I went to the main desk to inquire about the book .
#text=The librarian kindly greeted me and searched for the book on her card catalog computer system .
#text=She saw that there were 2 copies available in the New Books section .
#text=She and I walked upstairs to the New Books area and we were able to find the book .
#text=Then I walked back downstairs to check the book out .
#text=The check out lines were all full but there were a couple self-checkout machines available .
#text=After checking out the book , I went home and read it .
#text=It was very good and I finished it in 2 days .
#text=The next day , I returned the book to the library for the next eager patron to enjoy .
